content: उपगत {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Gone to, approached, arrived. {@--2@} Occurred, happened. {@--3@} Near, at hand. {@--4@} Got, obtained. {@--5@} Undergone, experienced. {@--6@} Furnished with. {@--7@} Gone to, become. {@--8@} Promised, agreed. {@--9@} Passed away, dead. {@--10@} Feeling, suffering (actively used). --तं {@--1@} Wealth acquired. {@--2@} Receipt; धनी वोपगतं दद्यात् स्वहस्तपरिचिह्नितं <ls>Y. 2. 93.</ls>
